item.description: Singles dance at Nuchie’s in Bristol from 8 pm to 12 am. This is our first dance after the summer break. Be sure to come and bring your friends. We’ll dance the night away to the music of our great DJ - Rockin’ Ron. There will be a delicious buffet from 8 to 9:30 pm for you to enjoy. Dress to impress and door prizes. Admission $15. For info, call Gail 860-582-8229. Directions to 164 Central Street: I 84 to Exit 33 (Rt. 72W), go to end and turn right, at 2nd light look for facility on right, parking on either side of building.
item.how_to_find_us: I’ll be at the entrance to the dance hall.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Dreamer's Dance
